files.description: Standalone Python script that loads the toy extraction CSV, computes a placeholder pooled estimate, writes a forest plot and summary table into runtime/_build/reports/, logs execution, and exits nonzero if required inputs/outputs are missing.
Toy meta-analysis extraction CSV with a minimal set of rows/columns needed for the script to compute per-study effects and a pooled estimate.
Placeholder file to ensure the reports output directory exists in the repository for saving plots, tables, and logs.

missionDescription: Create a toy CSV + minimal analysis script that (a) loads the CSV, (b) computes a placeholder pooled estimate, (c) saves a forest plot and summary table into runtime/_build/reports/, and (d) writes an execution log; ensure the runner fails if files are missing.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator
